ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: POST-only resources

On Nov 14, 2007, at 8:59 PM, Peter Lacey wrote:

> So my question
> again, is there anything wrong with my seemingly straightforward means
> of altering the status of an order or is it just another, legitimate,
> way of doing things?

AFAICT, we've entered the realm of design decisions instead of  
discussions about what's more "RESTful". Which is a good thing :-)
I don't think there is anything wrong with your approach. Mine stems  
from a design where I needed a simple way to allow retrieving orders  
based on their status, so modeling things this way solved two problems  
at once.

Stefan
--
Stefan Tilkov, http://www.innoq.com/blog/st/
